column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A 2 star policeman driving drunk plowed into a motorcycle cart selling fried meatballs and Bokalhoung (papaya salad)  at about 2 am on 12 July 2019. The incident occurred outside the front of Superstore Supermarket  along Street 1986 in Phnom Penh’s Sen Sok district.------According to the source
column7: was driven by the policeman at high speeds down 1986.------Upon reaching the scene
column8: the vehicle swerved to the right
column12: the driver made a negotiation with the owner of the cart
column13: and gave him $ 300 in compensation to end the story there and then. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/461158
